mapper.insert: insert into member(memId, memPwd, memName, memEmail, memTel, memClass) values(#{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memTel}, #{memClass})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where memId = #{memId} and memPwd = #{memPwd}
